00074 void joSTMapper::_validate(bool for_real)
00075 {
00076         copy_info();
00077         input1().validate( for_real );
00078 
00079         set_out_channels(Mask_All);
00080         Format temp = input0().format();
00081         width = temp.width();
00082         height = temp.height();
00083         info_.set( info_.x(), info_.y(), info_.r(), info_.t() );
00084         
00085         Format mapFormat  = input1().format();
00086         mapWidth = mapFormat.width();
00087         mapHeight = mapFormat.height();
00088 
00089 }

00091 void joSTMapper::_request(int x,int y,int r,int t, ChannelMask channels, int count)
00092 {
00093         input0().request(x,y,r,t, channels, count);
00094         input1().request(0,mapHeight,mapWidth,mapHeight, channels, count);
00095         
00096 }

00098 void joSTMapper::engine(int y, int x, int r, ChannelMask channels, Row& out)
00099 {
00101         out.range( 0, width );
00103         Row in1(x, r);
00105         input0().get(y, x, r, channels, in1);
00106         
00107         foreach (z, channels) 
00108         {
00110                 float* outPixelsR = out.writable(Chan_Red);
00111                 float* outPixelsG = out.writable(Chan_Green);
00112                 float* outPixelsB = out.writable(Chan_Blue);
00114                 for (int index = x; index < r; index++ )
00115                 {
00117                         Vector ST( in1[Chan_Red][index], in1[Chan_Green][index], 0.0f );
00118                         
00120                         if ( ST.length() > 0.0001f )
00121                         {
00123                                 int xMap = (int)( (float)mapWidth * ST.x );
00124                                 int yMap = (int)( (float)mapHeight * ST.y );
00126                                 Row in2(0, mapWidth);
00127                                 input1().get( yMap, 0, xMap, turn_on(channels, Mask_RGB), in2);
00128                                 in2.range( 0, mapWidth );
00130                                 outPixelsR[index] = ( in2[Chan_Red][xMap - 1] + in2[Chan_Red][xMap] + in2[Chan_Red][xMap + 1] ) / 3;
00131                                 outPixelsG[index] = ( in2[Chan_Green][xMap - 1] + in2[Chan_Green][xMap] + in2[Chan_Green][xMap + 1] ) / 3;
00132                                 outPixelsB[index] = ( in2[Chan_Blue][xMap - 1] + in2[Chan_Blue][xMap] + in2[Chan_Blue][xMap + 1] ) / 3;
00133 
00134                         } 
00135                         else
00136                         {
00137                                 outPixelsR[index] = 0.0f;
00138                                 outPixelsG[index] = 0.0f;
00139                                 outPixelsB[index] = 0.0f;
00140                         }
00141                 }
00142                 
00143         }
00144 }
